alert.note: Alert for Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:59PM MDT until July 15 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL LARAMIE COUNTY... At 358 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Warren AFB, or 8 miles southwest of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, South Greeley, Warren AFB, Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 3 and 10. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 350 and 362. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
